name: GetExistingDomains
description:
Retrieve all existing domains in the CMS.

Fetches a list of all domains that have been created in the CMS, with optional filters by creation or update date.

parameters.name: created_at_date_filter
parameters.description: Specify a date to return only domains created on this exact date. Format: YYYY-MM-DD.

value_schema.description: Only return domains created at this date.

parameters.name: get_domains_created_after_date
parameters.description: Only return domains created after the specified date (in YYYY-MM-DD format).

value_schema.description: Only return domains created after this date.

parameters.name: created_before_date
parameters.description: Filter to return only domains created before the specified date. Format: YYYY-MM-DD.

value_schema.description: Only return domains created before this date.

parameters.name: filter_by_update_date
parameters.description: Only return domains updated on this specific date. Use 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.

value_schema.description: Only return domains updated at this date.

parameters.name: filter_domains_updated_after
parameters.description: Return domains updated after this specified date. Use ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD).

value_schema.description: Only return domains updated after this date.

parameters.name: filter_updated_before_date
parameters.description: Return only domains updated before this date in ISO 8601 format (e.g., '2023-10-05T00:00:00Z').

value_schema.description: Only return domains updated before this date.

parameters.name: sort_criteria
parameters.description: Defines the order of the domain results. Provide an array of strings specifying fields to sort by, such as ['createdAt', 'updatedAt'].

parameters.name: paging_cursor_token
parameters.description: The paging cursor token of the last successfully read resource, used for paginated results.

value_schema.description: The paging cursor token of the last successfully read resource will be returned as the `paging.next.after` JSON property of a paged response containing more results.

parameters.name: maximum_results_per_page
parameters.description: Specifies the maximum number of domain results to return per page.

value_schema.description: Maximum number of results per page.

parameters.name: return_archived
parameters.description: Return only archived domains if true. Return unarchived if false.

value_schema.description: Whether to return only results that have been archived.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_cms API.

parameters.name: createdAt
parameters.description: Only return domains created at this date.

value_schema.description: Only return domains created at this date.

parameters.name: createdAfter
parameters.description: Only return domains created after this date.

value_schema.description: Only return domains created after this date.

parameters.name: createdBefore
parameters.description: Only return domains created before this date.

value_schema.description: Only return domains created before this date.

parameters.name: updatedAt
parameters.description: Only return domains updated at this date.

value_schema.description: Only return domains updated at this date.

parameters.name: updatedAfter
parameters.description: Only return domains updated after this date.

value_schema.description: Only return domains updated after this date.

parameters.name: updatedBefore
parameters.description: Only return domains updated before this date.

value_schema.description: Only return domains updated before this date.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: The paging cursor token of the last successfully read resource will be returned as the `paging.next.after` JSON property of a paged response containing more results.

value_schema.description: The paging cursor token of the last successfully read resource will be returned as the `paging.next.after` JSON property of a paged response containing more results.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results per page.

value_schema.description: Maximum number of results per page.

parameters.name: archived
parameters.description: Whether to return only results that have been archived.

value_schema.description: Whether to return only results that have been archived.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
